coder_instructions.summary: Implement a testing framework for the application using automated testing tools.

directives.do: Set up a testing framework using Jest for Node.js.
directives.why: Jest is a widely used automated testing tool that will help in executing test cases efficiently.

directives.do: Create a test plan document outlining the test cases based on functional and non-functional requirements.
directives.why: A test plan is essential to ensure all requirements are covered and to track testing progress.

directives.do: Implement test cases for functional requirements in the testing framework.
directives.why: This will validate the system's functionality as per the defined requirements.

directives.do: Generate a test report after executing the test cases.
directives.why: A test report will provide insights into system performance and accuracy of the tests.

files.purpose: Define project dependencies and scripts for testing.
Document the test plan and test cases.
files.template:
# Test Plan

## Goals
- Complete the test plan
- Execute test cases to validate system functionality
- Generate test report to evaluate system performance

## Constraints
- Must be completed within 2 weeks
- Use automated testing tools
- Test environment must match production

acceptance: Test plan document is created and outlines all test cases.
All functional test cases are implemented and pass successfully.
Test report is generated with accuracy > 95%.
notes: Ensure the testing environment is set up to mirror production.
Automate the test execution to ensure it runs within 1 hour.

plan.title: Testing Framework Implementation
plan.summary: Establish a comprehensive testing framework to validate the application functionalities and generate performance reports.

steps.title: Set Up Testing Environment
steps.description: Initialize the project with Jest and create necessary files for testing.
acceptance: Project initialized with Jest as the testing framework.
All necessary test files are created.

steps.title: Develop Test Plan
steps.description: Create a detailed test plan that includes all functional and non-functional requirements.
acceptance: Test plan document is complete and reviewed.

steps.title: Implement Functional Tests
steps.description: Write and execute test cases based on the functional requirements outlined in the test plan.
acceptance: All functional tests pass with expected results.

steps.title: Generate Test Report
steps.description: Compile the results of the test execution into a report.
acceptance: Test report generated with accuracy metrics.
